column4: hey guys i installed a driver but it's screwed my system up and now can't do anything, so is there a way i can delete this driver from recovery mode? please can someone help me out
Is it an ATI driver?  I've never gotten one of those to work properly.
no it's a wifi driver, my wifi was kinda working but wasnt very good, so i tried to install a different driver from source and it's killed my machine
Ah.  Sorry, I've never had any trouble with wifi drivers...
You could also blacklist it if that doesn't work.
Go back to the source directory where you did the `make install` and do a `make uninstall`
i'm in dir that i did the make install
Try going back to their webpage and seeing if they have any docs on how to remove it.
there doesn't seem to be anything about that
Is there a README or something like that in the directory?
yeah but nothing about removing in readme
Read the Makefile and see if there's anything in there.  I've gotta go for now.  Good luck.
